prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The language is divided into three main components: What (workflows, tasks, and parameters), Who (personas), and How (knowledge, instruments, and actions).

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
